title: A Tale Of Two Michigans — Solar vs. Data Center Battle Intensifies
description:
People in rural Michigan are celebrating the defeat of a proposed solar farm that would power an Oracle data center.

The post A Tale Of Two Michigans — Solar vs. Data Center Battle Intensifies appeared first on CleanTechnica.
